claim_summary: The PASSE quarterly report notes that Arkansas pays PASSE organizations capitation rates that must be actuarially sound and reviewed by CMS【922699166651308†L36-L47】, and that the risk corridor arrangement has allowed the state to reclaim $613 million and a 2.5% premium tax has generated $194 million in nonfederal match since 2019【922699166651308†L66-L82】.

source.title: PASSE Quarterly Report to Arkansas Legislative Council (2025)
